name: Bani
description:
Dani finds out you drink orange juice, now he want to kill you. COLLECT 10 Milk and AVOID "Cube Guy".

Minimum Requirements:

1.Windows 7(32/64bit)

2. 2GB Ram

3.Intel core i5

4.Nvidia GeForce 310M(1242MB TurboCache)

Recommended Requirements:

1.Windows 10(32/64bit)

2. 4GB Ram

3.Intel Core i7

4.IDK:)
